## common-evented package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [evented(target, prop, descriptor)](./common-evented.evented.md) | Given a class property, this decorator changes it into a setter/getter pair; the setter will trigger <code>change:${prop}</code> when invoked |
